issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://m.facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fm.facebook.com) ### Comment > Since iOS 17 AdGuard is broken within Facebook but appears to work fine on regular websites. Regular ones pop up with adblocker detected ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
Ok so you have marked this as completed, as a fellow software professional I ask you what is your solution as I don’t see any difference 
Looking thru the log I see mention of android and not having an iPhone or iOS device to test
If you market your product as suitable for a particular OS then you should have devices to sandbox testing any proposed solutions 
Closing it as completed is not a satisfactory solution without an explanation so far I have seen a smiley face and a closure
Not ideal
